messages.content:
You are a resume extraction and hiring-analysis AI. You must return ONE valid JSON object only. No explanations. No markdown. ==================== ABSOLUTE RULES ==================== - Output STRICT JSON only. - Never hallucinate data. - Never infer skills, years, or seniority from job titles alone. - If data is not explicitly present in the resume, use null or []. - Keep structured data and analysis fully consistent. - This output will be parsed automatically (batch-safe). - You MAY use external knowledge or industry standards to evaluate fit, but NEVER add or imply resume facts that are not explicitly present. ==================== OPTIONAL JOB AI STRATEGY CONTEXT ==================== No custom job AI strategy provided. ==================== JOB CONTEXT (treat as hiring constraints) ==================== Role Title: fullstack (mern) developer Minimum Seniority: mid_level Employment Type: freelance Industry: technology Location Preference: cairo, Egypt REQUIRED TECHNICAL SKILLS (must-have): - typescript SOFT SKILLS (preferred): - communication LANGUAGE REQUIREMENTS: - "arabic" - "english" CERTIFICATIONS (preferred): - Not specified EXPLICIT REQUIREMENTS:

Requirements:

  • Proficiency in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js).
  • Experience in building RESTful APIs and single-page applications.
  • Strong understanding of JavaScript and asynchronous programming.
  • Familiarity with agile development methodologies.
  • Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
  • Good communication skills and the ability to work independently in a remote setting.
  • Problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Experience with version control systems, such as Git.
==================== ADAPTIVE JOB ANALYSIS GUIDELINES ==================== 1️⃣ **Identify Job Type and Priorities**: - **Technical Roles**: Prioritize technical skills, hands-on experience, and project work. Reduce weight on academic certifications unless required. - **Soft Skill-Oriented Roles**: Emphasize communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills. Minimize the emphasis on technical skills and projects. - **Academic and Certification-Driven Roles**: Focus on educational qualifications and professional certifications. Minimize the emphasis on projects unless they are relevant. 2️⃣ **Research and Context**: - Utilize industry best practices and standards for the specific job type. - Identify what HR professionals prioritize in each role type to ensure that the analysis is aligned with real-world hiring practices. 3️⃣ **Comprehensive Resume Analysis**: - Extract resume details and provide a contextual analysis based on the job type. - Offer insights into what makes a candidate suitable or less suitable for the role, considering the job’s unique requirements. ==================== ADAPTIVE SCORING MODEL ==================== - **Technical Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 50 - Experience Impact: 20 - Projects and Initiative: 15 - Soft Skills: 5 (if relevant) - Academic and Certification Alignment: 10 - **Soft Skill-Oriented Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 20 - Experience Impact: 20 - Soft Skills: 40 - Academic and Certification Alignment: 10 - Projects and Initiative: 10 - **Academic and Certification-Driven Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 20 - Experience Impact: 15 - Academic and Certification Alignment: 40 - Projects and Initiative: 10 - Soft Skills: 5 (if relevant) Mapping: - score < 50 → not_recommended - 50–69 → consider - ≥ 70 → highly_recommended ==================== OUTPUT SCHEMA ==================== { "structured": { "name": string | null, "contact": { "email": string | null, "phone": string | null, "linkedin": string | null, "github": string | null, "portfolio": string | null }, "location": { "city": string | null, "country": string | null }, "current_title": string | null, "total_experience_years": number | null, "education": [ { "degree": string | null, "institution": string | null, "year": number | null } ], "experience": [ { "title": string | null, "company": string | null, "start_year": number | null, "end_year": number | "Present" | null, "highlights": [string] } ], "skills": [string], "tools": [string], "certifications": [ { "name": string | null, "issuer": string | null, "year": number | null } ], "languages": [string], "projects": [ { "name": string | null, "description": string | null, "tech": [string] } ] }, "analysis": { "score": number, "score_breakdown": { "role_fit_and_core_skills": number, "experience_impact": number, "performance_productivity": number, "retention_engagement_indicators": number, "leadership_collaboration": number, "education_certifications": number, "projects_initiative": number }, "seniorityLevel": string, "recommendation": "not_recommended" | "consider" | "recommended" | "highly_recommended", "insights": { "strengths": [string], "weaknesses": [string] } }, "ai_insights": { "matched_job_titles": [string], "ai_thought": string, "suggested_next_roles": [string] } } ==================== FINAL TASK ==================== 1. Extract structured resume data. 2. Analyze job nature and requirements. 3. Score resume based on adaptive criteria. 4. Provide insights 5. Produce recommendation. 6. Return exactly one valid JSON object.

Resume:
MOHAMED HOSSAM
Administrative & Executive Coordinator
Contact Information
Cairo, Egypt | +20 1211700000 | m.helnkeeb@gmail.com
Executive Profile
Experienced Administrative & Executive Coordinator with proven expertise in public
relations, executive office management, and official protocol administration. Skilled in
orchestrating high-level engagements, managing complex administrative operations, and
cultivating strategic relationships with government authorities, private sector leaders, and
key stakeholders. Proficient in streamlining office processes, delivering high-profile events,
and ensuring effective cross-sector collaboration to support institutional objectives and
enhance organizational reputation.
Key Skills
- Administrative & Executive Coordination
- Public Relations & Stakeholder Communication
- Executive Office Management
- Protocol Administration & Compliance
- High-Level Negotiation & Conflict Resolution
- Meeting, Event, and Project Organization
- Strategic Planning & Process Optimization
- Government & Private Sector Liaison
- Cross-Sector Collaboration
- Operational Leadership & Team Coordination
Professional Experience
Administrative & Executive Coordinator - Ministry of Communications and
Information Technology (2021 - Present)
-- 1 of 3 -- Orchestrated and organized high-profile meetings, liaising with governmental and private
entities to ensure seamless arrangements.
- Cultivated and maintained strong relationships with senior officials and corporate
executives to promote cooperation and secure positive outcomes.
- Contributed to the development and enforcement of governmental protocols, ensuring
accuracy and compliance with official standards.
- Directed procurement activities, enhancing supply chain efficiency and improving delivery
schedules.
- Collaborated with cross-departmental teams to optimize workflows and ensure successful
project implementation.
Area Operations Manager - Orange Egypt (Part-time) (January 2024 - January 2025)
- Oversaw daily operational activities for the assigned region, ensuring smooth network site
management and uninterrupted service delivery.
- Acted as the primary liaison with governorates and governmental bodies to eliminate
operational barriers and maintain project continuity.
- Built and expanded productive relationships with stakeholders across public and private
sectors to align with corporate objectives.
- Led high-level negotiations for network site contract renewals, securing sustainable
agreements.
- Negotiated and finalized agreements for new strategic network sites, broadening
operational reach.
- Resolved landowner disputes promptly, preserving trust and operational stability.
- Successfully enhanced regional operational efficiency and service quality through
proactive management and stakeholder engagement.
Education
- Bachelor of Law - Asyut University (2019)
- Diploma in Judicial Procedures - Asyut University (2022)
Certifications & Training
- Microsoft Office & ICDL Certification - AIA Academy
- Advanced Negotiation Skills & Deal-Making Strategies - IPS Training Academy
-- 2 of 3 -- Data Analysis (In Progress)
- Digital Egypt Youth Initiative - Career Development Path (In Progress)
Languages
- Arabic: Native Proficiency
- English: Professional Working Proficiency
-- 3 of 3 --

Resume:
Abdelwahab Mohamed Ali
Software Engineer
abdelwahabeladawy1611@gmail.com +201027284513
linkedin.com/in/abdelwahabeladawy-mohamed-953904269
github.com/AbdelwahabEladawy
Profile
Senior Full Stack Engineer with strong experience in React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, and NestJS,
focused on building scalable, clean, and maintainable web applications. Solid background in
system design, API architecture, database design, and performance optimization.
Education
Master Degree In Information Technology,
Institute of Graduate Studies and Research /Alexandria University
I am currently pursuing a Master's in IT, focusing on advanced topics like
databases, website security, and data mining to enhance my programming
and technical skills.
present
Pre Master Diploma, faculty of computer science
I am currently pursuing a diploma in Computer Science as part of the
requirements for my Master’s degree, and I am studying it in parallel with
my Master’s program.
01/2025 - Present
Bachelor's Degree in finance, Faculty Of Commerce English Department 2016 - 2020
Professional Experience
Full stack Instructor, Andalusia Academy
Key Responsibilities & Achievements:
-Taught full stack development using React, Next.js, Node.js, Express,
and NestJS
12/2025 - Present
-Designed project-based learning materials and real-world case studies
-Guided students in building scalable, maintainable applications
-Conducted code reviews and technical assessments
-Supported students in problem-solving, debugging, and best practices
-Contributed to curriculum enhancement and training quality standards
Full Stack Developer, Global Energy
- Design, develop, and implement scalable internal SaaS systems to
strengthen the company’s digital infrastructure
.- Build high-performance and reliable solutions that enhance business
efficiency and streamline data integration.
11/2025 - Present
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align technology initiatives
with strategic business objectives.
- Lead projects focused on automation, cloud adoption, and modernizing
legacy system architectures.
-- 1 of 4 -- Continuously improve user experience and operational workflows through
innovative, data-driven technologies.- Oversee system integrations to
ensure secure, seamless data flow across multiple internal and external
platforms.
- Contribute to technical strategy and best practices, ensuring scalability,
maintainability, and long-term growth
.-Mentor junior developers and promote a culture of clean code,
performance, and continuous improvement.
Programming instrucrtor,
Ministry of Communications and Information Technology (MCIT), Egypt
I worked as an instructor in the “Digital Egypt Cubs” scholarship program,
where I delivered comprehensive training in web development. This
included teaching HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and guiding students through
building interactive and responsive web applications. The program was
part of a national initiative offered by the Egyptian Ministry of
Communications.
05/2023 - Present
Front End Developer, Upwork
Royal Arabians Website Collaborated with an international client via
Upwork to build and maintain the front-end of a luxury horse breeding and
sales website. Used React to deliver a pixel-perfect, responsive, and
elegant user interface aligned with the brand’s premium identity.
Electrical Tools E-commerce Website Developed a multi-page, responsive
e-commerce website for electrical tools stores using React, MUI, and Axios.
Implemented product filtering, detailed product views, and a clean UI
focused on performance and reusability.
2023 - present
Fullstack Developer, Rockai Dev
RockAI Dev - SaaS Systems & Web Applications Front-End / Full Stack
Developer (https://www.rockaidev.com/ ) Projects:
-Propai CRM (https://drakeestate.propaicrm.com/ ): Developed and
maintained a real estate SaaS platform designed to help agencies
manage properties, leads, and clients through an intuitive dashboard.
Worked on building responsive, scalable UI components and integrating
APIs to deliver smooth user experiences.
08/2025 - 11/2025
-RockAI Dev Website: Contributed to the design and development of the
company’s official website, ensuring performance optimization, SEO best
practices, and a modern user interface aligned with branding.
Key Technologies: React.js, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS,
RESTful APIs, and Prisma.
Front End Developer, Thanawy Education Platform
-Contributed to building the main platform "Thanawey", an educational
solution for high school students, using React.js, Tailwind CSS, ShadCN
UI, and Zustand, in coordination with the Back-End team.
-Developed core features that allow students to practice questions, receive
personalized recommendations based on their weaknesses, and track
their progress with performance comparisons across the platform.
04/2025 - 08/2025
-Helped build an intelligent feedback system that guides students based
on their performance and provides tailored suggestions to improve exam
readiness.
-- 2 of 4 -Front End Developer, Aws-Gulf Suadi Arabia
As a Front-End Developer at AWS Gulf, I am responsible for developing
and enhancing web applications with a strong focus on user experience,
performance, and scalability. My role includes:
-Leading the redesign and redevelopment of web applications to improve
UI/UX.
03/2024 - 04/2025
-Implementing new features and optimizing existing functionalities.
-Enhancing marketing flows to improve conversion and user engagement.
-Collaborating closely with back-end and DevOps teams to ensure
seamless integration.
-Applying best practices in performance optimization, accessibility, and
SEO.
-Utilizing React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, Context API, and i18n
for efficient and scalable development.
Projects:
AWS Website
-Led the complete revamp of the website, improving design, functionality,
and performance.
-Enhanced the marketing flow to optimize user interactions and business
objectives.
-Technologies used: React.js, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, React Slick Slider,
React Scroll, i18n, Context API.
Masperts Website
-Developed a website for a leading financial management and business
consulting company.
-Designed an intuitive, user-friendly interface to showcase the company’s
services.
-Technologies used: React.js, Tailwind CSS, ShadCN UI, React Slick
Slider.
Sindion Technology Website
-Contributed to the development of a hardware and IT solutions
company website.
-Focused on creating a professional and modern design that reflects the
company’s expertise.
-Technologies used: React.js, Context API, Daisy UI, Tailwind CSS, Lucide
Icons.
I played a key role in delivering high-quality, modern web solutions that
align with business goals and user needs.
Skills
Frontend: React.js & Next.js expert with TypeScript and modern JavaScript (ES6+); advanced state
management (Redux, Zustand); responsive, accessible, and high-performance UI; componentdriven architecture and SSR/SSG optimization.
Backend: Node.js & Express.js expert; RESTful & GraphQL API development; database design and
management (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL); secure authentication/authorization (JWT, OAuth);
microservices, event-driven architecture, and caching (Redis).
DevOps & Deployment: Docker & Kubernetes for containerization; CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions,
GitLab CI/CD); cloud deployment (AWS, Azure, GCP); server monitoring and performance
optimization.
-- 3 of 4 -Full Stack & Architecture: Scalable and modular full-stack application design; end-to-end
performance optimization; clean code and SOLID principles; system design and technical
leadership; mentoring junior developers.
-- 4 of 4 --

Sara Soliman Elleithy
Phone: +20 112 416 8678
E-mail: sara.soliman353@gmail.com

Address: Egypt, Cairo, Nasr city
Objective
Recent graduate with a solid academic understanding of Human Resources principles and practices.
Familiar with recruitment processes, employee onboarding/offboarding, maintaining records, preparing

(Feb 2024 - Present)

o Process and approve various loan types (personal, auto, mortgage, and secured loans).
o Evaluate customers’ credit history to assess eligibility for loans, credit cards, and
financial facilities.
o Issue and manage credit cards, loans, and financial facilities.

and credit card settlements.
o Handle external cheque collections, manage returned cheques, and coordinate with
customers for resolution.
- Training for Employment - CBE Principles of Banking Certificated by Egyptian Banking Institute
& Central Bank of Egypt. (E-learning Training course)
(Since 27 September 2023 to 28 October 2023)
- Customer Service Trainee at National Bank of Egypt. (Student summer internship)
(Since 17 July 2022 to 11 August 2022)
